author: emoreno@thehill.com (J. Edward Moreno)
title: Pompeo pressed G7 leaders to refer to 'Wuhan virus' in statement: report
description: U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo pressed Group of Seven (G7) leaders to refer to the novel coronavirus as the “Wuhan virus,” according to a report by the German magazine Der Spiegal.The G7 leaders have thus far not been able to agree on a joint...
